Package audio

Audio properties, interfaces and CODECs

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AudioInterface The abstract audio interface.
AudioInterface.Packetizer Audio sender interface used by instance of the AudioInterface class to send captured audio samples to the remote peer.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCODEC Base class for CODECs that can convert to and from PCM.
AudioBuffer Encapsulates the concept of an audio buffer with a time-stamp.
AudioCodecAlaw Converts a 16-bit linear PCM stream from and to 8-bit A-law.
AudioCodecUlaw Converts a 16-bit linear PCM stream from and to 8-bit u-law.
AudioInterfacePCM Implements the audio interface for 16-bit signed linear audio (PCM_SIGNED).
